message: I have a great product that I think you'll love. Would you like to make an offer on it?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. That's a bit high for me right now.  Would you consider $100?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $135. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I understand it's a good product, Alice. How about we split the difference and do $120?
